page.title: 13A Pheasantry
page.content: He has four types of pheasant.They are the yellow Golden pheasant,the Chinese ring neck the Melanistic,common English and he has some cross breeds.Mr Davidson does not mark his birds for security.The cock weighs about 7.7kg and the hen weighs about 6.6kg.The male has the fanciest tail but the female's tail is the same length as the male's and their tails are about 60cm long.Pheasants start laying eggs when they are a year old.If the birds are caged they will live for about 14 or 15 years but in the wild they live about 6 years. Pheasants eat wheat and drink lots of water.Pheasant eggs are slightly smaller than hen eggs.But they taste just as good.Most people think that the young female tastes the best.He buys back the shot birds and exports many of them to the continent.
